name: Destined Nations
description:
Fly your way through the endless void of space and survive various disasters such as black holes and asteroids! In this Sci-Fi adventure game, your goal is to deliver your cargo in one piece.

Features:

 - Manage your spacecraft's resources

 - Shoot asteroids to defend your cargo

 - Collect ore to raise your score

 - Bring your cargo to its destination.

Developed by RAPD

Based in New Zealand
